name: Let There Be Light (michaelaranda)
description:
Let There Be Light is a tiny world simulator built for Ludum Dare 45.

Explore the elements and their effects, listen to the music generated by your world, and experience creations as you nudge, play, and discover.

Version 1.3 (Oct 09, 2019)
-Fixes bugs in block placement
-Fixes bugs in fire propagation
-Fixes bugs in water and lava flow
-Fixes bugs in the text display system

Version 1.2 (Oct 08, 2019)
-Tweaks some values in response to player feedback.

Version 1.0 (Oct 07, 2019)
-Original Ludum Dare submission.
